d(n,r),{content:e};if(o.isPlainObject(e))return p(n,r),e;f(e,n)}};e.getOpts=function(){for(var t=[],e=0;e\n\n\n \n\n\n \n\n<$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-]] [get[version]] [[-red?style=social]] +[join[]]}}} />\n<$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Files-]] [plugintiddlers[]count[]] [[-red?style=social]] +[join[]]}}} />\n\n<$button setTitle=<> setField=\"text\" setTo=\"contents\">\n Contents\n\n<$button setTitle=<> setField=\"text\" setTo=\"explore\">\n Explore\n\n\n!! A Beautiful Replacement For Javascript's \"alert\"\n\n* [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-swealalert]]\n* [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw]]\n\n!! Exampls\n\n```\nswal(\"Oops!\", \"Something went wrong!\", \"error\");\n\nswal({\n title: \"Are you sure?\",\n text: \"Are you sure that you want to leave this page?\",\n icon: \"warning\",\n dangerMode: true,\n})\n.then(willDelete => {\n if (willDelete) {\n swal(\"Deleted!\", \"Your imaginary file has been deleted!\", \"success\");\n }\n});\n\nconst willDelete = await swal({\n title: \"Are you sure?\",\n text: \"Are you sure that you want to delete this file?\",\n icon: \"warning\",\n dangerMode: true,\n});\n\nif (willDelete) {\n swal(\"Deleted!\", \"Your imaginary file has been deleted!\", \"success\");\n}\n\nswal(\"Type something:\", {\n content: \"input\",\n})\n.then((value) => {\n swal(`You typed: ${value}`);\n});\n\nswal({\n text: \"Wanna log some information about Bulbasaur?\",\n button: {\n text: \"Search!\",\n closeModal: false,\n },\n})\n.then(willSearch => {\n if (willSearch) {\n return fetch(\"https://v1.hitokoto.cn\");\n }\n})\n.then(result => result.json())\n.then(json => console.log(json.hitokoto))\n.catch(err => {\n swal(\"Oops!\", \"Seems like we couldn't fetch the info\", \"error\");\n});\n```\n\n> sweetalert2 is smilar with sweetalert\n\n!! Simple Lib\n\n* simple-notify\n\n!! Example\n\n<$swal />\n\n\n"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/widget.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/widget.js","text":"/*\\\ntitle: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/widget.js\ntype: application/javascript\nmodule-type: widget\n\nsweetalert\n\\*/\n(function() {\n /*jslint node: true, browser: true */\n /*global $tw: false */\n\n if (!$tw.browser) return;\n\n const Widget = require('$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js').widget;\n\n class SwalWidget extends Widget {\n constructor(parseTreeNode, options) {\n super(parseTreeNode, options);\n this.executing = false;\n }\n\n render(parent, nextSibling) {\n this.parentDomNode = parent;\n this.computeAttributes();\n this.execute();\n\n const button = this.document.createElement('button');\n button.textContent = this.text;\n parent.insertBefore(button, nextSibling);\n this.domNodes.push(button);\n\n const handleClick = () => {\n if (this.executing) {\n return;\n }\n this.executing = true;\n\n const swal = require('$:/plugins/oeyoews/sweetalert/sweetalert.min.js');\n swal({\n icon: this.icon,\n title: this.title,\n text: this.text,\n confirmButtonText: 'OK',\n // other SweetAlert options here\n });\n\n this.executing = false;\n };\n\n button.addEventListener('click', handleClick);\n }\n\n computeAttributes() {\n super.computeAttributes();\n this.icon = this.getAttribute('icon', 'success');\n this.title = this.getAttribute('title', 'Default title');\n this.text = this.getAttribute('text', 'Default text');\n }\n }\n\n exports.swal = SwalWidget;\n})();\n","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"widget"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/explore":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/explore","text":"<$macrocall $name=\"tree\" prefix={{{ [addsuffix[/]] }}}>\n"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/icon","text":"\n","type":"image/svg+xml"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/startup-message.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/startup-message.js","text":"/*\\\ntitle: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/startup-message.js\ntype: application/javascript\nmodule-type: library\n\nswealalert startup message\n\n\\*/\n\n// const swal = require('$:/plugins/oeyoews/sweetalert/sweetalert.min.js');\nconst neotw = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('neotw')) || {};\nconst currentDate = new Date().toDateString();\nconst noNotifyDate = neotw.noNotifyDate;\n\n/* // online tip\nif (window.location.protocol === 'https:' && noNotifyDate !== currentDate) {\n swal({\n title: '👋 Welcome to neotw !',\n text: '',\n icon: 'success',\n buttons: {\n no: {\n text: 'Silent',\n value: false,\n },\n yes: {\n text: 'Close',\n value: true,\n visible: true,\n },\n },\n }).then(result => {\n if (!result) {\n neotw.noNotifyDate = currentDate;\n localStorage.setItem('neotw', JSON.stringify(neotw));\n }\n });\n} */\n\naxios\n .get('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oeyoews/neotw/main/package.json')\n .then(function (response) {\n const version = response.data.version;\n\n if (window.location.protocol === 'https:' && noNotifyDate !== currentDate) {\n swal({\n title: 'Welcom to Neotw 👋',\n text: 'The version of neotw is ' + version,\n icon: 'success',\n timer: 3000, // 3 seconds\n buttons: {\n no: {\n text: 'Silent',\n value: false,\n },\n yes: {\n text: 'Close',\n value: true,\n visible: true,\n },\n },\n }).then(result => {\n if (!result) {\n neotw.noNotifyDate = currentDate;\n localStorage.setItem('neotw', JSON.stringify(neotw));\n }\n });\n }\n })\n .catch(function (error) {\n swal({\n title: 'Error',\n text: 'Failed to fetch version: ' + error.message,\n icon: 'error',\n });\n });\n","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"library"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/startup.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/startup.js","text":"/*\\\ntitle: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/startup.js\ntype: application/javascript\nmodule-type: startup\n\nswealalert\n\n\\*/\n(function() {\n /*jslint node: true, browser: true */\n /*global $tw: false */\n 'use strict';\n\n exports.name = 'swal-startup-hook';\n exports.platforms = ['browser'];\n exports.after = ['load-modules'];\n exports.synchronous = true;\n\n exports.startup = function() {\n window.swal = require('$:/plugins/oeyoews/sweetalert/sweetalert.min.js');\n if (window.location.protocol === 'https:') {\n require('$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-sweetalert/startup-message.js');\n }\n\n // https://github.com/Jermolene/TiddlyWiki5/compare/master...confetti-plugin\n $tw.rootWidget.addEventListener('om-swal', event => {\n const paramObject = event.paramObject || {};\n const icon = paramObject.icon || 'success';\n const title = paramObject.title || 'Title';\n const text = paramObject.text || 'Sweet Alert';\n swal({ icon, title, text });\n });\n };\n})();\n","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"startup"}}}
